dct_description_sm: Dated 1726, within title cartouche (upper left). Includes Str. of Annian to north of California. [Page] 45, in manuscript (upper right).
[1736], with added engraved "45" (top right). Date is missing from cartouche and Str. of Annian has been poorly erased. Issued in Modern history, Vol. 28 / Thomas Salmon, 1736.
[1739], with "Vol.3.p.129" (top left). Issued in Modern history, Vol. 3 / Thomas Salmon, 1739.
“50” (upper right). “BBB” (lower right). “A” (bottom center). Includes Str. of Annian to north of California.
LC 578 & 585(45); Leighly 167 (Plate XVIII); UCB; Barbara McCorkle
Tradewinds shown between 30 N and 30 S latitudes.

Cartography nearly identical to his map entitled: A Map of AMERICA According to ye Newest and most Exact Observations, [1711?], although this later map includes parts of Western Europe, islands in the north Atlantic, and changed and added labels.
California with indented northern coast; Mozeemleck to north, Gulf of California to east.
